entry.title: Keyyard/today-notes: Today Notes is a lightweight, daily task management application built using Next.js, React, TailwindCSS, Prisma, and Postgresql - Supabase. It allows users to create tasks that expire in 24 hours, providing a clean and minimalist interface with support for dark and light themes.
entry.content: Today Notes is a lightweight, daily task management application built using Next.js, React, TailwindCSS, Prisma, and Postgresql - Supabase. It allows users to create tasks that expire in 24 hours, providing a clean and minimalist interface with support for dark and light themes.

entry.content: modular and lightweight color computation framework built in TypeScript

entry.title: Jeffreys38/MakkoServer: Makko Server is a lightweight and scalable API server designed to deploy and serve AI models and image generation services. Inspired by platforms like Hugging Face Inference API and Prodia, Makko Server provides a unified endpoint system to host and access multiple machine learning models via RESTful APIs.
entry.content: Makko Server is a lightweight and scalable API server designed to deploy and serve AI models and image generation services. Inspired by platforms like Hugging Face Inference API and Prodia, Makko Server provides a unified endpoint system to host and access multiple machine learning models via RESTful APIs.

entry.title: noureddineouafy/silana-lite-ofc: Silana Lite Official is a smart WhatsApp *** powered by AI, offering a wide range of features like automated responses, multimedia downloads, language translation, text-to-speech, and more. Lightweight and efficient, it enhances personal and group chats with customizable plugins and seamless automation for a smarter messaging experience.
entry.content: Silana Lite Official is a smart WhatsApp *** powered by AI, offering a wide range of features like automated responses, multimedia downloads, language translation, text-to-speech, and more. Lightweight and efficient, it enhances personal and group chats with customizable plugins and seamless automation for a smarter messaging experience.

entry.title: paulmagadi/GitHub-Business-Card-Generator: A lightweight web app that lets you generate a stylish business card from any GitHub username or profile URL. You can download the card as a PDF , PNG or share it directly along with the GitHub link. Includes dark mode support!
entry.content: A lightweight web app that lets you generate a stylish business card from any GitHub username or profile URL. You can download the card as a PDF , PNG or share it directly along with the GitHub link. Includes dark mode support!

entry.title: yeole-rohan/ray-content-editor: This is a lightweight, extensible, and user-friendly content editor built with pure JavaScript. It supports rich text editing, inline code, code blocks with syntax styling, tooltips, and a fully integrated emoji picker.
entry.content: This is a lightweight, extensible, and user-friendly content editor built with pure JavaScript. It supports rich text editing, inline code, code blocks with syntax styling, tooltips, and a fully integrated emoji picker.
